tool.name: Extract reads
tool.description: in FASTQ/A format from NCBI SRA.
tool.command: #if $input.input_select == "file": fastq-dump --log-level fatal --accession '${input.file.name}' #else: vdb-config -s "/repository/user/main/public/root=\$PWD"; ASCP_PATH=`which ascp`; ASCP_KEY=`dirname \$ASCP_PATH`/asperaweb_id_dsa.openssh; prefetch --ascp-path "\$ASCP_PATH|\$ASCP_KEY" $input.accession; vdb-config -s "/repository/user/main/public/root=\$PWD"; fastq-dump --accession $input.accession #end if --defline-seq '@\$sn[_\$rn]/\$ri' --stdout #if str( $split ) == "yes": --split-spot #end if #if str( $alignments ) == "aligned": --aligned #end if #if str( $alignments ) == "unaligned": --unaligned #end if #if str( $minID ) != "": --minSpotId $minID #end if #if str( $maxID ) != "": --maxSpotId $maxID #end if #if str( $minlen ) != "": --minReadLen $minlen #end if #if str( $readfilter ) != "": --read-filter $readfilter #end if #if str( $region ) != "": --aligned-region $region #end if #if str( $spotgroups ) != "": --spot-groups $spotgroups #end if #if str( $matepairDist ) != "": --matepair-distance $matepairDist #end if #if $clip == "yes": --clip #end if #if str( $outputformat ) == "fasta": --fasta #end if #if $input.input_select=="file": $input.file #else: $input.accession #end if > $output
tool.help: This tool extracts reads from SRA archives using fastq-dump. Browse the NCBI SRA for SRR accessions at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Traces/sra/sra.cgi?view=studies. The fastq-dump program is developed at NCBI, and is available at: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Traces/sra/sra.cgi?view=software. Contact Matt Shirley at mdshw5@gmail.com for support and bug reports.
